item.title: Pagination - Scoopi Web Scraper - why just scrape when you can scoop
item.description: Pagination Many pages provide pagination buttons or links to navigate through series of pages. We can use link locators described in previous chapter to scrape pages using pagination. The Books example folder contains three HTML pages which has pagination link at the bottom of pages. defs/examples/book/page/page-1.html <div> <ul class="pager"> <li class="current">Page 1 of 50</li> <li class="next"><a href="page-2.html">next</a></li> </ul> </div> The Books Example 4 go through each page and scrape book items.
